projects.name: JSS Infotech
desc: A digital hub of knowledge, bringing you updates on notices, assignments, and placement opportunities.

projects.name: MCQ Module
desc: Picture this: an online theater for teachers and societies, where multiple-choice questions take the stage and the results pop up like magic tricks! Abracadabra, learning just got a whole lot snazzier!

projects.name: Event Manager
desc: A college event-tracking web app, keeping students informed about daily happenings on campus. Stay in the loop, never miss out!

projects.name: Know Your College
desc: 'Know Your College', is a nifty web application that's your virtual compass for navigating the expansive world of JSS. It's your go-to guide for unraveling the intriguing corners of the college and its lively neighborhood.

projects.name: Zealicon Website
desc: An annually themed digital hub for Zealicon, the Techno-Cultural Extravaganza at JSSATEN!
